full_summary:
=====================================

### Concealed Radio Antennas and Concealed Antenna Parts Standing Offer

#### Solicitation Overview

The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) invites contractors to submit a proposal for a Regional Individual Standing Offer (RISO) to provide concealed radio antennas and concealed antenna parts to the RCMP's "E" division in Chilliwack, British Columbia. The RISO will be for a period of two (2) years, with an option to extend the standing offer for two (2) additional one (1) year periods.

#### Tender Details

* **Solicitation Number:** M2989-2-0184
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2023-10-25T17:00:00
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** 2023-11-30
* **Expected Contract End Date:** 2025-03-31

#### Basis of Selection

The lowest priced bid will be considered the most responsive bid.

#### Tender Requirements

* Tenders must be submitted electronically to the RCMP Bid Receiving Unit at E_Pacific_Bids@rcmp-grc.gc.ca.
* Bidders are required to review the attached tender documents for further information.

#### Trade Agreements

This solicitation is subject to the following trade agreements:
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement

#### Indigenous Procurement

The RCMP encourages Indigenous-owned businesses to participate in this procurement process. For more information on Indigenous procurement opportunities, please visit the Government of Canada's website.

#### Contact Information

* Alice Weng
* alice.weng@rcmp-grc.gc.ca
* (778) 290-3473

#### Attachment

The following documents are attached to this solicitation:
* Concealed Radio Antennas and Concealed Antenna Parts RISO (english)
* Amendment 01 (english)
